activities: Subsidiaries of Choice Hotels franchise hotels in the EU.  Personal information is received from franchisees and customers in the EU, which is used to execute the services requested by the customer, maintain the necessary records to support the transaction and to facilitate settlement of the charges for the requested services. Information from completed transactions may be used for subsequent direct marketing by Choice Hotels. Also, personal employee information about employees of Choice Hotels subsidiaries is transfered to the company.
